title: ADC MAIN - S5, looking for duo support- OCE
body:
looking for a support duo for serious grinding voer the next two weeks, im on from 8 am till 4 am the next day, can play any adc. add us 
Hi Im LinkzZ

replies.body:
Username: PugsPunny
Silver 4 atm and I play support. I usually play melee supports such as Thresh and Braum.

Hey buddy. I used to main supp, and am happy to go back to it if you are any good.
Keen to play tonight if you are down.
Play Thresh & Bard mainly but pool includes Braum, Rakan, Blitz, Leo depending on who you would be playing. In game name is the same as this username and am Silver 5, 76LP atm {{champion:432}}  Feel free to add me!
